title: News On Social Media: From Otis Byrd To Malaysia Sedition Charges
teaser: In our weekly installment, we take a look at how some of the events of the news are filtering through social media.
contentencoded:
In our weekly installment, we take a look at how the news is filtering through social media.

P. Kim Bui, West Coast producer for reported.ly, joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to discuss three major news stories: the mysterious death of Otis Byrd, who was found hanging from a tree in Mississippi, the arrests of opposition figures in Malaysia and the funeral of a woman who was beaten to death for allegedly burning the Qur’an in Afghanistan.

Guest

  • P. Kim Bui, West Coast producer of reported.ly. She tweets @kimbui.
